# CSS3 GitHub Buttons Extended Icons Addon Only #

## Extended Icons Pack ##

Demo: [http://demo.codefusionlab.com/css3-github-buttons/ext_button_icons/](http://demo.codefusionlab.com/css3-github-buttons/ext_button_icons/)
